items.answer: We accommodate orders from 50 to 10,000 units, with flexible manufacturing capabilities to meet diverse client requirements across different industries.
items.question: What is your minimum order quantity?

items.answer: Standard production timelines range from 2-4 weeks depending on component complexity, with expedited options available for urgent requirements.
items.question: How long does production typically take?

items.answer: We maintain ISO 9001:2015 certification and follow stringent quality control processes to ensure consistent, high-precision manufacturing standards.
items.question: What quality certifications do you have?

items.answer: We specialize in brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and other metals, offering comprehensive material selection for diverse industrial applications.
items.question: What materials can you work with?

aboutusintro.title: About RT Turnomatics
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering Experts Delivering Innovative Manufacturing Solutions
aboutusintro.description: RT Turnomatics is a precision component manufacturer specializing in high-quality brass and metal parts for automotive, pneumatic, and aerospace industries. We combine advanced technology with expert craftsmanship to deliver exceptional manufacturing solutions.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.content: RT Turnomatics consistently delivers precision parts that exceed our quality expectations. Their attention to detail is remarkable.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.content: Exceptional precision and reliability. RT Turnomatics has been our trusted manufacturing partner for complex aerospace components.
